name: Learn Body Parts!
description:
"Learn Body Parts" is an educational learning game for small kids (pre-school) where learning process is created via touchable pictures of a boy and a girl, spoken body part names and text labels.

This learning game is meant to be used together by parents and kids in order to create the best learning experience.

"Learn Body parts" contains two in game scenarios:

- learning mode, where interactive picture is presented; when body part is touched, part's name is spoken

- puzzle mode, where puzzle pieces with body parts are dragged and dropped to create a full body picture

All game content is available available in multiple languages: English, German, French, Russian, Spanish and Lithuanian. Content language is managed from inside the app by the user.

App contains advertising.

"Learn Body parts" is a home-made app created by Lukas and Erika under the name of "EnL design studio"

If you like this game, check out other learning games by the developer.
